item.title: A little bit of Web Bluetooth
item.description: Communicating using the Bluetooth protocol has traditionally been the sole preserve of native applications. Now you can do it from a web page! This is the first of two short posts on my experiments with Puck.js and Web Bluetooth. This one looks at security; the second will look at a Web Bluetooth to MQTT gateway experiment. What’s Web Bluetooth? Some may know, that from Google Chrome v56, the Web Bluetooth API went from being an experimental “opt-in” feature to enabled by default.
